mapper.select: select s.id as id,s.title as title, h.name as holeName, r.start_date as startDate,r.start_time,r.end_time, r.end_date as endDate, img_route as imgRoute from rent_place_reservation_tb as r join hole_tb as h on r.hole_id=h.id join show_Tb as s on s.id = r.show_id where s.organizer_id=#{id} AND s.show_status=1;
